text: You *can* wear the flag as clothing, if you want to. As decided in United States v. Eichman, "desecration" of the flag is a form of expression protected under the First Amendment.

has ruled that due to the First Amendment to the United States Constitution, it is unconstitutional for a government (whether federal, state, or municipal) to prohibit the desecration of a flag, due to its status as "symbolic speech."
